title: Often-overlooked Slovenia worth a trip
text: BING NEWS: Often-overlooked Slovenia worth a trip Why we went: We have an American friend who recently moved to Slove nia. This often overlooked country has much to offer, with abundant natural beauty and a lovely capital city, Ljubljana. Don’t miss: The Skocjan Caves in Slovenia’s Karst region are ...
